revision.text:
[[Traders]] in ''[[Escape from Tarkov]]'' sell many items, however some are available to trade for other items in your stash. Below is a complete list of these trades. If you see a trade missing from the below list, please join our [https://discord.gg/7ZeEyfU Discord] or note it [[Talk:Barter trades|here]].
